item.title: Build and Deploy .Net Core to Digital Ocean
item.description: This is a Github action that will build, publish and deploy an Asp.Net Core web application to a Digitial Ocean droplet that is running Ubuntu.

item.title: Reboot
item.description: Well that didn't take long. Two blog posts in March of 2019 and that was all she wrote. Let's give this another go.

item.title: Hugo Static Site Generator + GitHub
item.description: Choosing a platform to begin the blogging journey was the first step that I had to undertake. As a developer I think sometimes I spend too much time doing research and trying to find the “perfect” option.
